text: Richard Alvin Jensen (July 4, 1934 â€“ November 19, 2014) was an American theologian, author, and the Carlson Professor of Homiletics Emeritus at the Lutheran School of Theology at Chicago. Jensen was born in Fremont, Nebraska. Jensen died in Lakeville, Minnesota, aged 80. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American theologians Category:Educators from Nebraska Category:Writers from Nebraska
